title: Herb Garden Essential Oil Collection | Tisserand
description: Our herb essential oils are the perfect way to balance your mind and refresh your skin. Discover our herbal essential oils collection online today.
cleaned_text: Generally herbaceous in their aroma and softer than green oils, herbal essential oils contain a variety of soothing aromatherapeutic benefits and have been made with 100% natural ingredients. From Chamomile to Marjoram, there's plenty of choice for you in our herbal oils collection.
